title: E-Commerce Website Development
description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform using MERN stack with payment integration and admin dashboard.
feedback: Excellent work! The implementation is clean and well-documented. Great attention to detail on the UI/UX.

title: Machine Learning Model for Sentiment Analysis
description: Built and trained a sentiment analysis model using NLP techniques to classify customer reviews.

title: Mobile App Development Internship
description: Worked on developing a cross-platform mobile application for fitness tracking.
feedback: Good effort, but the documentation needs improvement. Please add more comments and update the README file.

title: IoT Smart Home System
description: Designed and implemented a smart home automation system using IoT sensors and cloud integration.
feedback: Impressive work! The integration between hardware and software is seamless.

title: Data Analytics Dashboard
description: Creating an interactive dashboard for visualizing business analytics data with real-time updates.
